faq.question: Is greywater safe for my plants?
faq.answer: Yes! When using plant-friendly detergents (free of sodium, boron, and bleach), greywater is safe and beneficial for most plants. The nutrients in greywater can actually help plants thrive.

faq.question: How much does an L2L system cost?
faq.answer: A basic L2L system typically costs $200-500 in materials for DIY installation. Professional installation ranges from $1,000-2,500 depending on your layout.

faq.question: Do I need a permit?
faq.answer: Requirements vary by location. Many states allow L2L systems without permits for washing machine greywater. Check your local codes or use our state directory.

faq.question: How much maintenance is required?
faq.answer: L2L systems are very low maintenance. Simply clean the washing machine lint filter regularly and refresh mulch basins annually.
